projects.project_title: ci-rewrite tibco project to spring boot for citi
projects.project_description: involved in ci-rewrite project for citi, migrating tibco project to spring boot project worked in agile developement, focusing on user story creation, rest api developement, and ci/cd deployement.

practice_projects.project_description: developed full-stacke-commerce app with angular frontend,spring boot backend.Integrateduserauth, product catalog, cart, checkout, order tracking. designed ui, integrated with backend apis.

developed a blog app with angular, featuring content management module (cmm) for writing, categorizing, and publishing blogs. integrated comments, mailing services, and hosted on Firebase for seamless database management and hosting

created a movie app using react.js, leveraging an external api to fetch data on currently playing, upcoming, and trending movies. Implemented a search function for users to easily find specific movies of interest.

created an exam portal with angular and spring boot,employing jwt authentication for security. utilized a microservices architecture for scalability. admins manage tests, while students access and complete them, viewing results afterward

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering - 8.11
